mapper.sql: MACHINE_ID, MODEL, PRICE, MIN_ORD_QTY, STATUS, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, TERM_TYPE, COMM_TYPE, MACHINE_MANUF, IS_OUTER_PINPAD, IS_NON_CONN, IS_ELECT_SIGN, DEPOSIT, STAND_AMT, MACHINE_TYPE, BACK_TYPE, ACTIVITY_NAME, RETURN_DEPOSIT, IS_NEW_MACHINE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from IMS_TERM_MACHINE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into IMS_TERM_MACHINE (MACHINE_ID, MODEL, PRICE, MIN_ORD_QTY, STATUS, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, TERM_TYPE, COMM_TYPE, MACHINE_MANUF, IS_OUTER_PINPAD, IS_NON_CONN, IS_ELECT_SIGN, DEPOSIT, STAND_AMT, MACHINE_TYPE, BACK_TYPE, ACTIVITY_NAME, RETURN_DEPOSIT, IS_NEW_MACHINE) values (#{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minOrdQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineManuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOuterPinpad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNonConn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isElectSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{standAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isNewMachine,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update IMS_TERM_MACHINE
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIN_ORD_QTY = #{minOrdQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERM_TYPE = #{termType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_TYPE = #{commType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MACHINE_MANUF = #{machineManuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_OUTER_PINPAD = #{isOuterPinpad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_NON_CONN = #{isNonConn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ELECT_SIGN = #{isElectSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STAND_AMT = #{standAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACHINE_TYPE = #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_TYPE = #{backType,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACTIVITY_NAME = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_DEPOSIT = #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_NEW_MACHINE = #{isNewMachine,jdbcType=CHAR},
where MACHINE_ID = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update IMS_TERM_MACHINE set MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MIN_ORD_QTY = #{minOrdQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERM_TYPE = #{termType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_TYPE = #{commType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MACHINE_MANUF = #{machineManuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_OUTER_PINPAD = #{isOuterPinpad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NON_CONN = #{isNonConn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ELECT_SIGN = #{isElectSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STAND_AMT = #{standAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACHINE_TYPE = #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_TYPE = #{backType,jdbcType=CHAR}, ACTIVITY_NAME = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_DEPOSIT = #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_NEW_MACHINE = #{isNewMachine,jdbcType=CHAR} where MACHINE_ID = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select a.pos_activity_id AS ID, (c.brand_name||'|机具活动关系编号:'||a.pos_activity_id ||'|活动名称:'||c.activity_name ||'机型:'||IMS_POS.POS_MODEL||'|单价:'||b.DEPOSIT || '活动时间:' || c.activity_start_time ||'/'|| c.activity_end_time || (case c.Stand_Back_Type when '3' then '|达标返现对象代理商' when '4' then '|达标返现对象商户' else '|达标返现对象无' end ) ) AS NAME,b.BACK_TYPE, replace(IMS_POS.POS_MODEL,IMS_POS.TMS_MODEL,'')as manufactor, IMS_POS.TMS_MODEL, c.ACTIVITY_START_TIME, c.ACTIVITY_END_TIME, c.STAND_TIME, c.STAND_AMT, c.DEPOSIT as PRICE, ( case c.ACTIVITY_TYPE when '01' then '0' -- 01：普通活动 普通机0 when '00' then (case c.activate_type when '00' then '1' when '01' then '2' end )-- 00：返现活动 ACTIVATE_TYPE 激活方式 00：首笔交易缴纳押金(特价机 1)，01：预装激活(特价机（无押金）2) end ) as POSTYPE from IMS_POS_ACTIVITY a left join IMS_TERM_MACHINE b on a.pos_id=b.machine_id left join IMS_MACHINE_ACTIVITY c on a.activity_id=c.activity_id left join IMS_POS on IMS_POS.ID=b.Model where b.status=1 and c.status='00' and c.brand_code=#{busplatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
